channel.title: Threat Modeling on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Threat Modeling on Open Security Summit

item.title: Threat Modeling Glasswall Desktop
item.description: About this session: Hands on Threat Modeling session for the Glaswall Desktop product (currently in beta) which can be downloaded from https://glasswall-desktop.com/

item.title: Threat Modeling Manifesto
item.description: https://www.threatmodelingmanifesto.org/ 15 OWASP authors have come up with the Manifesto, excited to have a number of them joining us in this session. We will start with an overview of what the manifesto is and continue discussing how can this be used by security people and devs together. What are you most interested about it? Come and share you opinion and questions. All are welcome!
